``14:00`` - [``anthdm - How To Build A Custom TCP Server In Golang!?``](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qJQrrscB1-4)

``21:40`` - [``Rob Pike - Concurrency is not Parallelism by Rob Pike``](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oV9rvDllKEg)

Notes:

Concurrency: The composition of independently executing processes (things)
- Concurrency is about dealing with alot of things at once

Parallelism: The simultaneous execution of multiple things (possibly related, possibly not)
- Parallelism is about doing alot of things at once

``21:40`` - [``Communicating Sequential Processes by C.A.R. Hoare``](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~crary/819-f09/Hoare78.pdf)
